title: Friend's match history won't scroll all the way down
body: Though this isn't that important, I just wanted to know if this only happens to me, or if it's something riot hasn't noticed yet.

replies.body: It should only be showing the most recent 20 matches, but let me know if you aren't seeing that many.
Yeah, I am seeing the last twenty but the bottom of the 20th is left off (level, summoner spells carried, KDA, cs, gold earned).

This has been a bug since 7.15.
It assumes the Match History box is in the same place as your profile one, not taking into account viewing another profile insets it under yours so it looses space at the top.
Well, i'm just glad it's not a problem with my client then :D
Well it only lets you look at the past 20 games, so you can't scroll further then that.
Yeah, but i should be able to see all of the info for the 20th without opening it
